title: marco.barulli
author: marco.barulli
content: Blockstream Jade Hardware Wallet- Never used- Still sealed original packagePrice: 40 EUR + shippingContact: https://t.me/mbarulliImage: https://mega.nz/file/MFg2jI7B#7c4lQ_MlMOSnLECSZYqbt5r9HBeAAGCHdiwGhLA2Rxo

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: marco.barulli on July 15, 2022, 03:58:43 PMBlockstream Jade Hardware Wallet- Never used- Still sealed original packageI wouldn't be so sure about that! Based on the provided image, it's quite clear that the bottom tamper-evident seal has been tampered with [I can clearly see the glue residue on the right side and there's a change in its reflection as well]!FYI: I've already archived everything!

comments.author: marco.barulli
comments.body: Here are better images for you to judge.https://mega.nz/file/dZ4VXBKA#kcis0K_HA7LeUijUNXXOIk6Eb1JRwIiP0PXcDAOLwWAhttps://mega.nz/file/tMJWVa4R#f3Q4RgbXXN2WLd2_r0hhAfRpHvsmCPXRk6GbEbUGwewHappy to offer full refund if the seals are broken.
